imdb.title: Gantz
imdb.plot: A group of people are resurrected from their deaths by a mysterious black ball called GANTZ to combat alien criminals hiding on Earth.

episodes.title: Sayônara
episodes.plot: Change is in the air for the players of the deadly game. Fed up with his aunt, Kato finds a new place to live with his little brother. Meanwhile, Kei's attitude pushes Kishimoto away, and Tetsu's life spirals brutally out of control.

episodes.title: Hayaku ikitee'!
episodes.plot: The Gantz calls the players for another round. Among the new faces gathered before the sphere: a television evangelist that thinks he has all the answers and a girl who seems willing to give Kei the attention he seeks.

episodes.title: Ore gayaru!
episodes.plot: When Kato shares what he knows in an effort to help the new players, the evangelist begins to think something sinister is afoot. The holy man learns just how correct he is as the game's new targets make their presence known.

episodes.title: Koitsura utte iin'daro?
episodes.plot: The team's efforts to defeat the giant aliens are hindered by two thugs who are brutally tormenting a homeless man - the very same homeless man that Kei and Kato encountered just before their deaths.

episodes.title: Okaeri
episodes.plot: Kei is on a rampage, leading the battle against the giant aliens. Unfortunately, when the towering beasts fall, the group discovers that their fight to survive is only just beginning.

episodes.title: Nanja, aryâ'
episodes.plot: After claiming victory against the giant red and green aliens, the group boldly rushes into battle against the smaller statues. Soon enough, they find their numbers thinned by an enormous new enemy.

episodes.title: Ore o ute'!
episodes.plot: Several players meet with gruesome ends as the living statues continue their onslaught. Tragically, one of the mutilated victims is someone very dear to Kato and Kei.

episodes.title: Onichan?
episodes.plot: The carnage continues and truly no one is safe. As wounded Kei struggles to stay alive, his teammates fall one after the other. When the final foe is defeated, only one player will be around to see the score.

episodes.title: Ni do to iuna!
episodes.plot: Kei returns to the Gantz and finds many familiar faces will be joining him in battle. Unfortunately, Kei is shocked to see that their alien prey wears a familiar face as well.

episodes.title: Kurono seijin!
episodes.plot: With no explanation, the Gantz has chosen Kei to be hunted. At first, the rest of the players are unsure of what they should do - but the black sphere soon helps them decide that Kei should die.

episodes.title: Derarenai meikyû wa nai n da
episodes.plot: The new players are beginning to see just how dangerous the two bum-killing freaks really are. As the situation escalates, the members of the team look to the one person who might be able to help them survive - Kei.

episodes.title: Ikite kaerôze
episodes.plot: Madness is taking over as the team hunts the two brutal maniacs in their midst. The number of fatalities grows quickly, and Kei begins to understand that the Gantz might not be his worst problem.

episodes.title: Ikite kure
episodes.plot: When people die, they are brought to a room where they must suit up and fight for their lives against all odds for the chance to return the the lives they once knew. Gantz, the maniacal sphere that brings the dead back to a state of limbo, will rest at nothing to see that it is entertained by senseless killing of alien creatures it gives orders to dispatch. Can Kei Kurono survive the insanity of this upsidedown reality?

episodes.title: Atashii asa ga kita
episodes.plot: After Kei and his childhood friend, Kato, are torn into bloody pieces by a speeding train, they awake in an unfamiliar room, surrounded by strangers. In the middle of the room is a bizarre black sphere: the Gantz.

episodes.title: Ningen janee
episodes.plot: The Gantz opens, revealing unusual weaponry and odd suits. The strangers are sent into the city, ordered to kill an alien that roams the streets - and then the carnage begins.

episodes.title: Kei-chan, suggee
episodes.plot: With the small alien dead, the large alien exacts his revenge, slaughtering many with the group. When the creature pursues Kei, the young man quickly discovers that his physical abilities are enhanced by the suit he wears.

episodes.title: Soreji wa, chiiten o hajimeru
episodes.plot: The scores are tallied and Nishi explains some of what he knows about the rules of the strange world of the Gantz. The unusual situation grows even odder the next day when Kei wakes - and finds that this nightmare is no dream.

episodes.title: Tteiukoto wa, ano toki
episodes.plot: Seemingly back among the living, Kato must protect his brother from their hateful aunt. Meanwhile, Kei's special suit gives him an advantage against the bullies at school. But will it help him when Kishimoto appears at his door?

episodes.title: Yattââa'
episodes.plot: Despite his best efforts, Kei remains unsatisfied during Kishimoto's overnight stay at his apartment. At the place Kato calls home, more ugly evidence of abuse piles up.

episodes.title: Neratteruze
episodes.plot: Kato's patience is being tested. At home, the abuse dished out by his aunt pushes him to the breaking point. Meanwhile, at school, a group of bullies forces him to take decisive and drastic action.

episodes.title: Yabee!
episodes.plot: A new round begins for the gang. Appearing before the Gantz, they find themselves joined by a diverse group of fresh players. As the game gets underway, Kei panics when he realizes his suit is nowhere to be found.

episodes.title: Sokkô korosu
episodes.plot: As the group prepares to track down the Suzuki alien, Tetsu's gang is creating conflict and Nishi's smart mouth isn't helping the situation. When tensions boil over, blood is spilled before the hunt even begins.

episodes.title: Yuzô-kun?
episodes.plot: Without his suit, Kei finds himself in serious jeopardy when he captures the attention of the Suzuki alien. Nishi ends up in even graver danger when his suit malfunctions at the worst possible time.

episodes.title: Aitsu wa utenai
episodes.plot: Kato is forced to take action to save Nishi from certain death, but he may not be ruthless enough to kill the Suzuki alien. Time is running out for yet another player trapped in the cruel world of the Gantz.

episodes.title: Katô-kun wa matteite
episodes.plot: The group is beginning to figure out the rules of the twisted game in which they are caught, but survival is still far from guaranteed as the battle with the remaining Suzuki aliens erupts.

episodes.title: Shinde kudachii
episodes.plot: Kei, suitless and outnumbered by the Suzuki aliens, must face the biggest monster alone. When the battle ends and the scores are tallied, the group sees that there might be a way to escape their strange fate.
